name: yanki-obsidian
description: An Obsidian plugin that syncs flashcards from a folder in your vault to Anki. Pure Markdown syntax. No fuss.

scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && tsx ./scripts/build.ts production && pnpm run manifest
scripts.dev: rimraf ./dist && pnpm run manifest && touch ./dist/.hotreload && tsx ./scripts/build.ts
scripts.obsidian:link: pnpm run obsidian:unlink && mkdir -p "$(pwd)/examples/Yanki Demo Vault/.obsidian/plugins" && ln -s "$(pwd)/dist" "$(pwd)/examples/Yanki Demo Vault/.obsidian/plugins/yanki"
scripts.release: pnpm run manifest && bumpp package.json manifest.json --commit 'Release: %s' --tag '%s'
scripts.yanki:use-npm: pnpm remove yanki ; pnpm add -D yanki

obsidian.author: Kitschpatrol
obsidian.description: Sync flashcards from a folder in your vault to Anki. Pure Markdown syntax. No fuss.
obsidian.name: Yanki
